XXratksanu:5: santaś cāmī vivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
XXratksanu:10: (77.11) yasya kramākramau na vidyete na tasyārthakriyāsāmarthyam /
XXratksanu:12: na vidyete cākṣaṇikasya kramākramāv iti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ
XXratksanu:19: abhede hi prathama eva kṣaṇe śaktatvād /
XXratksanu:28: (77.20) tad ayam akṣaṇike dharmiṇi kramākramābhāvalakṣaṇo hetur nāsiddho vaktavyaḥ /
XXratksanu:34: (78.3) yenaiva hi pratyakṣātmanā pramāṇenāparaprakārābhāvād vidhibhūtābhyāṃ kramākramābhyāṃ vidhibhūtasyārthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptiḥ prasādhitā, tenaivārthakriyāsāmarthyābhāvena kramākramābhāvasya vyāptiḥ
XXratksanu:36: na hi dahanādinā dhūmāder vyāptisādhakapramāṇād aparaṃ dhūmādyabhāvena dahanādyabhāvasya vyāptisādhakaṃ kiñcit pramāṇaṃ śaraṇabhūtam asti /
XXratksanu:37: tasmād vidhyor eva vyāptisādhakaṃ pramāṇam abhāvayor api vyāptisādhakam iti nyāyasya duratikramatvāt sattvābhāvena kramākramābhāvo vyāpta eveti nānaikāntika ity anavadyo vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
XXratksanu:38: tad ayam akṣaṇikād vinivartamāṇaḥ svavyāpyaṃ sattvaṃ nivartya kṣaṇike viśrāmayatīti sattvahetoḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhir apy anavadyā. /
XXratksanu:41: tathā hi na tāvad ayaṃ prasaṅga hetuḥ /
XXratksanu:48: pratītir hi pratyakṣeṇānumānena vikalpamātreṇa vā syāt /
XXratksanu:50: svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulaḥ sādhāraṇo hetuḥ vyāpakānupalambhaś ca svarūpāsiddhaḥ syāt
XXratksanu:52: (79.4) antimapakṣe tu na kaścid dhetur anāśrayaḥ syāt /
XXratksanu:54: (79.6) api ca, tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt, liṅgajanma
XXratksanu:55: vā, saṃskārajaṃ vā, sandigdhavastukaṃ vā, avastukaṃ vā /
XXratksanu:61: (79.11) pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvad pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
XXratksanu:62: akṣaṇikātmanaḥ sarvadaiva tvanmate 'pratyakṣatvāt na cānumānatas tadabhāvas tatpratibaddhaliṅgān upalam bhādityāśrayāsiddhis tāvad uddhatā
XXratksanu:67: tathā hi kramisahakāryapekṣayā kramikāryakāritvan tāvad aviruddham /
XXratksanu:71: na ca tayor āvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyān tadvataḥ kā cit kṣatiḥ /
XXratksanu:77: yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijam āgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantaram, tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat sahakārinānātvād api kramavat kāryanānātvopapatter aśakyaṃ bhāvānām pratikṣaṇam anyonyatvam upapādayitum iti /
XXratksanu:80: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuryād iti cet /
XXratksanu:81: (79.26) tad idaṃ mātā me vandhyety ādivat svavacanavirodhād ayuktam /
XXratksanu:82: yo hi uttarakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ sa katham ādau tat kāryaṃ kuryāt /
XXratksanu:84: na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikam api karotīti /
XXratksanu:86: nanv ayam akṣaṇikaḥ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati /
XXratksanu:87: tac cāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣiva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe sad iti tadāpi janayet /
XXratksanu:88: akurvan vā tṛtīyādiṣv api na kurvīta /
XXratksanu:92: satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati na tu tenaiva /
XXratksanu:96: tathaiva laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ sampratipatter iti na kramikāryakāritvapakṣoktadoṣāvasaraḥ /
XXratksanu:98: ye hi kāryam utpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣās teṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kārye 'nuvartamāneṣv api teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthād ūnā sāmagrī
XXratksanu:101: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva kartāro yenāmi niṣpatter ārabhya kāryaṃ vidadhyuḥ /
XXratksanu:106: na ca sattvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatireko 'py ayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
XXratksanu:107: na hi kramākramābhyām anyasya prakārasyābhāvaḥ siddhaḥ /
XXratksanu:110: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇām iti na kramākramābhyām arthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisiddhiḥ
XXratksanu:113: kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvam api parokṣam eveti na tāvat pratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
XXratksanu:116: (80.22) api ca kramākramābhyām arthakriyākāritvaṃ vyāptam ity
XXratksanu:118: yadi krameṇa vyāptaṃ katham akrameṇa, athākrameṇa na tarhi
XXratksanu:120: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptim iti tu bruvatā vyāpter evābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati /
XXratksanu:121: na hi bhavaty agnir dhūmabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vyāpta iti /
XXratksanu:123: (80.26) api ca kim idaṃ bādhakam akṣaṇikānām asattāṃ sādhayati /
XXratksanu:130: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā taddhetuḥ syād iti sattvam anaikāntikam /
XXratksanu:132: atha sā vikalpyate tadā pūrvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpo dūṣaṇīyaḥ /
XXratksanu:135: (81.2) kiṃ ca na bhūtalavad atrākṣaṇiko dharmi dṛśyate /
XXratksanu:136: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasya cit dṛśyasya pratipattim antareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakyata iti /
XXratksanu:139: ubhayadharmatve cānaikāntikatvam iti na trayīṃ doṣajātim atipatati /
XXratksanu:140: (81.6) yat punar uktam akṣaṇikatve kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyāvirodhād
XXratksanu:142: tatra virodhasiddhim anusaratā virodhy api pratipattavyaḥ /
XXratksanu:145: (81.8) pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sann eva syāt ajanakasyāprameyatvāt
XXratksanu:147: saṃvṛtisiddham api vāstavaṃ kālpanikaṃ vā syāt /
XXratksanu:152: tatra kiṃ virodho vāstavaḥ, kālpaniko vā /
XXratksanu:156: na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjalir iti /
XXratksanu:158: (81.18) nityaṃ nāsti na vā pratītiviṣayas tenāśrayāsiddhatā hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatir ataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
XXratksanu:159: śūnyaṃ ca dvitayena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasiddhir asatā śakṣā kramāder api /
XXratksanu:162: iha vastuny api dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā gavi
XXratksanu:163: gotvam, paṭe śuklatvam turage gamanam ityādi /
XXratksanu:164: avastuny api dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo vandhyāputre vaktṛtvābhāvo gaganāravinde gandhābhāva ityādi /
XXratksanu:165: tatrāvastuni dharmitvaṃ nāstīti kiṃ vastudharmeṇa dharmitvaṃ nāsti /
XXratksanu:170: (81.28) dharmasya kasya cid avastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kim ihāsti no vā kvāpy asti cet katham iyanti na dūṣaṇāni nāsty eva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
XXratksanu:175: paraṃ tu pratiṣidhyata iti vyaktam idam īśvaraceṣṭitam /
XXratksanu:176: tathā hy avastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanena dharmitvābhāvaḥ kim avastuni vidhīyata, anyatra vā, na vā kva cid apīti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
XXratksanu:181: (82.8) tṛtīyas tu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvād iti katham avastuno
XXratksanu:183: tasmād yathā pramāṇopanyāsaḥ prameyatvasvīkāra pūrvakatvena vyāptaḥ, vācakaśabdopanyāso vā
XXratksanu:189: atha na vyāpakadharmaḥ, tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsambhava iti mūkataivātra balād āyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
XXratksanu:191: na hy abruvan paraṃ bodhayitum īśaḥ /
XXratksanu:192: [a]bruvan vā doṣam imaṃ parihartum iti mahati saṃkaṭe praveśaḥ /
XXratksanu:193: (82.17) avastuprastāve sahṛdayānāṃ mūkataiva yujyate iti cet /
XXratksanu:195: avastuprastāve svayam eva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāyayā niḥsartum icchati /
XXratksanu:196: na cāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamardanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣedhuṃ śakṣate /
XXratksanu:197: tataś cātrāpi kramākramabhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastvātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmitvaṃ kena pratiṣidhyate /
XXratksanu:207: 'vastudharmeṇa dharmitvam avyāhatam iti nāyam āśrayāsiddho vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
XXratksanu:210: kevalam asau vyavahārāṅgabhūtā pratītir vastvavastunor ekarūpā na bhavati /
XXratksanu:212: yathā pratyakṣam anumānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi ca vikalpaḥ
XXratksanu:213: / avastunas tu sāmarthyābhāvād vikalpamātram eva pratītiḥ /
XXratksanu:214: vastuno hi vastubalabhāvinī pratītir yathā sākṣāt pratyakṣam, paramparayā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpo 'numānaṃ ca /
XXratksanu:217: (83.4) na hy abhāvah kaś cid vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkartavyo 'pi tu vyavahartavyaḥ /
XXratksanu:218: sa ca vyavahāro vikalpād api sidhyaty eva /
XXratksanu:222: 'kṣaṇikaḥ svīkartavya iti nāyam apratītatvād apy āśrayāsiddho hetur vaktavyaḥ /
XXratksanu:224: (83.9) na kaś cid dhetur anāśrayaḥ vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra sulabhatvād iti
XXratksanu:229: (83.11) yathā ātmano vibhutvasādhanārtham upanyastaṃ sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvād iti sādhanam
XXratksanu:232: samarthite tu hetāv avastuka iti brūmaḥ /
XXratksanu:239: evaṃ dṛṣṭāntasyāpi vyomotpalāder dharmitvaṃ vikalpamātreṇa pratītiś cāvagantavyā /
XXratksanu:241: vikalpamātreṇa pratīteś cāpahnotum aśakyatvān nāyam āśrayāsiddho hetuḥ /
XXratksanu:245: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇasāmarthyam asti tadā prathamakṣaṇabhāvikāryavat dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvyam api (?) kāryaṃ kuryāt /
XXratksanu:249: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
XXratksanu:250: sahakārisahitād eva tataḥ kāryotpattidarsanāt iti cet /
XXratksanu:251: (83.24) yadā tāvad amī militāḥ santaḥ kāryaṃ kurvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvam eṣām astu ko niṣeddhā /
XXratksanu:252: militair eva tu tatkāryaṃ karttavyam iti kuto labhyate /
XXratksanu:255: tasmāt sāmagrī janikā naikaṃ janakam iti sthiravādināṃ manorājyasyāpy aviṣayaḥ /
XXratksanu:256: (83.29) kiṃ kurmo dṛśyate tāvad evam iti cet /
XXratksanu:257: dṛśyatāṃ kiṃ tu pūrvasthitād eva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭād bhāvāt kāryotpattir anyasmād eva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇād iti vivādapadam etat /
XXratksanu:258: tatra prāg api sambhave sarvadaiva kāryotpattir na vā kadā cid apīti virodham asamādhāya tad eva kāryotpattir iti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpām arhati /
XXratksanu:261: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñādūṣaṇam asmābhiḥ sthirasiddhidūṣaṇe pratipāditam iti tad evāvadhāryam
XXratksanu:264: yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijam āgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantaraṃ, tato
XXratksanu:265: 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat sahakārinānātvād api kramavat kāryanānātvam iti cet
XXratksanu:267: tathāpi tat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam /
XXratksanu:268: tad yadi prāg api, prāg api kāryaprasaṅgaḥ /
XXratksanu:269: atha paścād eva, na tadā sthiro bhāvaḥ /
XXratksanu:270: (84.11) na ca kāryaṃ sahakāriṇo 'pekṣata iti yuktam, tasyāsattvāt /
XXratksanu:271: hetuś ca sann api yadi svakāryaṃ na karoti, tadā tatkāryam eva tan na syāt /
XXratksanu:277: na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikam api karotīti /
XXratksanu:279: sthirasvabhāvatve bhāvasyottarakālam evedaṃ na pūrvakālam iti kuta etat /
XXratksanu:280: tadabhāvāc ca kāraṇam apy uttarakāryasvabhāvam ity api kutaḥ /
XXratksanu:285: tasya yad uttarakṣaṇa eva kāryaṃ karotīti cet /
XXratksanu:286: na, pramāṇabādhite svabhāvābhyupagamāyogād iti na tāvad akṣaṇikasya kramikāryakāritvam asti
XXratksanu:288: dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe kārakasvarūpasadbhāve punar api kāryakaraṇaprasaṅgāt /
XXratksanu:289: (84.21) kārye niṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvād ūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayed iti cet
XXratksanu:291: kriyākārakasvarūpasambhave janakatvam avadhāryam iti prāg eva pratipādanāt
XXratksanu:292: / kāryasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ kartum aśakyatvam eva kāraṇam asamartham
XXratksanu:294: (84.23) tad ayam akṣaṇike kramākramikāryakāritvābhāvo na siddhaḥ /
XXratksanu:295: na ca kramākramābhyām aparaprakārasambhavo yena tābhyām avyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt /
XXratksanu:300: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo 'dṛśyatve 'pyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣād eva sidhyati /
XXratksanu:301: evaṃ kramākramābhyām arthakriyākāritvaṃ vyāptam iti kramākramayor anyo
XXratksanu:309: na hy abhāvaḥ kaś cid vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣatkartavyaḥ, api tu vikalpād eva vyavahartavyaḥ /
XXratksanu:310: na hy abhāvasya vikalpād anyāpratipattir apratipattir vā sarvathā /
XXratksanu:312: evaṃ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpād eva pratipattiḥ.4 /
XXratksanu:314: vyāpakānupalambhena nirdoṣeṇa sattvasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāpter avyāhatatvāt /
XXratksanu:316: sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiṃ ca sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvād iti sthitam
XXratksanu:317: (85.13) nanu vyāpakānupalabdhir iti yady anupalabdhimātraṃ tadā na tasya sādhyabuddhijanakatvam avastutvāt /
XXratksanu:318: na cānyopalabdhir vyāpakānupalabdhir abhidhātuṃ śakyā bhūtalādivad anyasya kasya cid anupalabdher iti cet /
XXratksanu:321: yathā hi neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvād ity atra vṛkṣāpekṣayā kevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhir vṛkṣānupalabdhiḥ /
XXratksanu:322: śiṃśapāpeksayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhir eva śiṃśapāyā abhāvopalabdhir iti svabhāvahetuparyavasāyivyāpāro vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
XXratksanu:323: tathā nityasya dharmiṇo vikalpabuddhyavasitasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇād eva kramikāritvākramikāritvānupalambhaḥ /
XXratksanu:324: arthakriyāpekṣayā ca kevalapratītir evārthakriyāyoga pratītir iti vyāpakānupalambhāntarād asya na kaś cid viśeṣaḥ /
XXratksanu:325: (85.22) adhyavasāyāpekṣayā ca bāhye 'kṣaṇike vastuni vyāpakābhāvād vyāpyābhāvasiddhivyavahāraḥ
XXratksanu:326: adhyavasāyaś ca samanantarapratyayabalād āyātākāraviśeṣayogād agṛhīte 'pi pravartanaśaktir bodhavyaḥ /
XXratksanu:331: ayaṃ ca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmiṇi tathā 'vastubhūte 'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ /
XXratksanu:332: (85.27) tathā hy ekajñānasaṃsargy atra vikalpya eva /
XXratksanu:334: śaśaśirasy api tena sahaikajñānasaṃsargitvasambhāvanayaiva śṛṅgaṃ niṣidhyate, tathā nīlādāv apariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmiṇā sārdham ekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau, yadi nitye bhavataḥ nityagrāhijñāne svadharmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātām iti sambhāvanaya ekājñānasaṃsargadvārakam eva pratiṣidhyate /
XXratksanu:335: kathaṃ punar etasmin nityajñāne kramākramayor asphuraṇam iti yāvatā kramākramakroḍikṛtam eva nityaṃ vikalpayām iti cet. ata eva bādhakāvatāro viparītāropam antareṇa tasya vaiyarthyāt.
XXratksanu:336: (86.6) kālāntare 'py ekarūpatayā nityatvam. kramākramau ca kṣaṇadvaye
XXratksanu:337: bhinnarūpatayā. tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryaśakteś ca parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇatayā durvāro virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayor antarbhāvaḥ. anantarbhāvāc ca suddhanityavikalpena
XXratksanu:338: dūrīkṛtakramākramasamāropeṇa katham ullekhaḥ. tataś ca pratiyogini nitye
XXratksanu:339: 'pi vikalpyamāne ekajñānasaṃsargilakṣaṇaprāpte nityopalabdhir eva nityaviruddhasyānupalabhyamānasya kramākramasyānupalabdhiḥ. tata eva cārthakriyāśakter anupalabdhiḥ. tasmād vyāpakavivekidharmyupalabdhitayā na
XXratksanu:341: (86.13) nanv etad avastudharmikopayogi vastv adhiṣṭhānatvāt pramāṇavyavasthāyā iti cet. kim idaṃ vastvadhiṣṭhānatvam nāma. kiṃ paramparayāpi vastunaḥ sakāśād āgatatvam, atha vastuni kena cid ākāreṇa vyavahārakāraṇatvam, vastubhūtadharmipratibaddhatvaṃ vā.
XXratksanu:342: (86.16) yady ādyaḥ pakṣas tadā kramākramasyārthakriyāyāś ca
XXratksanu:344: (86.18) na dvitīye 'pi pakṣe dosah sambhavati. kṣaṇabhaṅgivastu sādhanopāyatvād asya.
XXratksanu:345: (86.19) na cāntimo 'pi vikalpaḥ kalpyate. tasyaiva nityavikalpasya vastuno
XXratksanu:346: dharmibhūtasya kramākramavad bāhyanityopādānaśūnyatvenārthakriyāvad bāhyanityopādānaśūnyatve prasādhanāt. paryudāsavṛttyā buddhisvabhāvabhūtākṣaṇikākāre vastubhūte dharmiṇi
XXratksanu:348: (86.23) ayam eva nyāyo na vaktā vandhyāsutaś caitanyābhāvād ityādau yojyaḥ. etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādir antarbhāvayituṃ śakyate na tathāyam iti trilocano 'pi nirastaḥ.
XXratksanu:349: (86.25) na ca kramādyabhāvas trayīṃ doṣajātiṃ nātikrāmati, abhāvadharmatve
XXratksanu:351: (86.26) yat tvanena pramāṇāntarān nityānām asattvasiddhau kramādivirahasyābhāvadharmatā sidhyatīty uktam, tadvālasyāpi
XXratksanu:352: durabhidhānam. nityo hi dharmi. asattvaṃ sādhyam.
XXratksanu:353: kramikāryakāritvākramikāryakāritvaviraho hetuḥ. asya cābhāvadharmatvaṃ nāma asattvalakṣaṇasvasādhyāvinābhāvitvam ucyate. tac ca kramākrameṇa
XXratksanu:354: sattvasya vyāptisiddhau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatīty abhāvadharmatvaṃ prāg eva vidhyor vyāptisādhanāt pratyakṣād anumānād ekasmād vā pramāṇāntarāt siddham iti netaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ.
XXratksanu:355: (87.7) na ca sattāyām ivāsattāyām api tulyaḥ prasaṅgo bhinnanyāyatvāt.
XXratksanu:356: vastubhūtaṃ hi tatra sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca. tayor dharmy api vastv eva yujyate.
XXratksanu:357: (87.9) vastunas tu pratyakṣānumānābhyām eva siddhiḥ. tayor abhāve niyamenāśrayāsiddhir iti yuktam. asattāsādhane tv avastudharmo hetur avastu vikalpamātrasiddhe dharmiṇi nāśrayāsiddhidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ.
XXratksanu:359: (87.13) tathā vikalpādevākṣaṇiko virodhī siddhaḥ. vikalpollikhitaś cāsya svabhāvo nāpara ity api vyavahartavyam. anyathā tadanuvādena kramākramādirahitatvādiniṣedhādikam uktam. tatsvarūpasyānullekhād anyasyollekhād ity akṣaṇikaśaśaviṣāṇādiśabdānuccāraṇaprasaṅgaḥ. asti ca.
XXratksanu:360: ato yathā pramāṇābhāve 'pi vikalpasiddhasya vandhyāsutādeḥ saundaryādiniṣedho 'nurūpas tathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇikarūpasya tad
XXratksanu:361: eva pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ kīdṛso doṣaḥ syāt. yadi cākṣaṇikānubhavābhāvāt virodhapratiṣedhas tarhi vandhyāputrādyanubhavād eva saundaryādiniṣedho 'pi mābhūt.
XXratksanu:362: (87.20) nanv evaṃ virodhasyāpāramārthikatvam. taddvāreṇa kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhir apy apāramārthikī syād iti cet.
XXratksanu:363: (87.21) na hi virodho nāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcit
XXratksanu:365: yenaikasambandhino vastutvābhāve 'pāramārthikaṃ syāt. yathā tv iṣyate
XXratksanu:372: nāpy abhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo 'yam anayor asaṃkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ
XXratksanu:376: (88.1) nanu nityatvaṃ kramayaugapadyavattvaṃ ca viruddhau dharmau vidhūya nāparo virodho nāma, kasya vāstavatvam iti cet /
XXratksanu:377: (88.2) na, na hi dharmāntarasya sambhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ
XXratksanu:380: anyathā virodhanāmadharmāntarasambhave 'pi yadi na viruddhau dharmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasambhavaḥ
XXratksanu:381: viruddhau ced dharmau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ /
XXratksanu:384: nityaṃ nāsti na vā pratītiviṣayas tenāśrayāsiddhatā hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatir ataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi
XXratksanu:386: śūnyaś ca dvitayena sidhyati na vā 'sattā 'pi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasiddhir asatā śakyā kramāder api /
XXratksanu:389: dharmasya kasya cid avastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kim ihāsti no vā /
XXratksanu:390: kvāpy asti cet katham iyanti na dūṣaṇāni nāsty eva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
XXratksanu:391: (88.17) tad vam nityaṃ na kramikāryakāritvākramikāryakāritvayogīti paramārthaḥ /
XXratksanu:392: tataś ca sattāyuktam api naiveti paramārthaḥ /
XXratksanu:393: tataś ca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvād akṣaṇikān nivartamānam idaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇika eva viśrāmyatvena vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt kṣaṇikatvasiddhir avirodhini /
XXratksanu:394: (88.21) prakṛtiḥ sarvadharmāṇaṃ yad bodhān muktir iṣyate /
